List Valid Google Language Codes

Source: R/utils.R
google_language_codes.Rd

Gives a list of valid Language Codes for Google Fonts, or validates that the language codes given are valid.

google_language_codes(language_codes = c("latin", "latin-ext", "sinhala",
  "greek", "hebrew", "vietnamese", "cyrillic", "cyrillic-ext", "devanagari",
  "arabic", "khmer", "tamil", "greek-ext", "thai", "bengali", "gujarati",
  "oriya", "malayalam", "gurmukhi", "kannada", "telugu", "myanmar"))

Arguments

language_codes

Vector of potential Google language codes

See also

google_font()
